metadata.title: CVE-2020-28367 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Go before 1.14.12 and 1.15.x before 1.15.5 allows Argument Injection.

notes.note: mdeslaur> Packages built using golang need to be rebuilt once the vulnerability has been fixed. This CVE entry does not list packages that need rebuilding outside of the main repository or the Ubuntu variants with PPA overlays.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
golang-1.14 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
golang-1.15 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
